channel.title: Help with bug - get co owner
channel.description: I need help with a bug that I've been trying to fix forever now. The bug on devolution server where you can duplicate when trading. You get 2 of the same item, trade someone and at the same time you put one of the items in the trade window you right click on it before it goes in and click offer one and you now have 3 from 2. IF ANYONE KNOWS HOW TO FIX THIS TRADE BUG I WILL GIVE YOU CO OWNER. Please I'm begging of you I have to have my server up in 2 hours!

item.title: Help with bug - get co owner
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

But the bad thing about timers is that for each different timer, it makes a new thread. So if you have different timers(Barrows degrading, farming, trading, dueling) and you need each instance of Player to be able to be unique to each player(like you don’t want the barrows degrading for one player, and it affecting another players set, if they got the sets at different time), that ends up creating alot of threads, and eventually lag.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with bug - get co owner

item.title: Help with bug - get co owner
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:10, topic:255425”]Use the Timer tutorial in the tutorial section(kind of what it’s for.)

because the server processes at about every 600 ms, you need to make an action timer to measure the time between clicks, and if it is less than 600 ms, dont let it do anything, until 600 ms has passed.[/quote]
see timers fix everything they are really easy to make after you look at the tut and will fix your problem. I am busy atm coding my own server, but i will search for a good tut on timer making and edit this post with it.

Read full topic

Use the Timer tutorial in the tutorial section(kind of what it’s for.)

item.title: Help with bug - get co owner
item.dc:creator: @Torax Torax
item.description:
@Torax wrote:

Well I am sorry for getting mad and bribing the way I did I will not do it again, but I need to ask one thing please reaper. I dont know the first line of code to make a timer, and please if you could provide it and atleast give me an idea where to place it I made a new post with the spots to place it I dont know where. This is all I ask I’ve been trying to fix this for 1 month now.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with bug - get co owner
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

you didnt specify which dupe you were trying to fix and yes this will fix that as well…making a timer after they click accept that will not let htem click will stop them from right clicking it and taking it out.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Torax wrote:

You dont get it, thats not how the duping works! :mad:

I need to beable to make it so a player cannot right click on an item after they already clicked it before it goes into the trade window

Read full topic

item.title: Help with bug - get co owner
item.dc:creator: @Torax Torax
item.description:
@Torax wrote:

Can someone tell me EXACTLY WHERE to get one. DONT SUGGEST GOOGLE SEARCH AND SHIT JUST LINK ME STRAIGHT TO IT IF YOU CANT FIND IT THEN DONT SUGGEST STUPID ASS IDEAS

Read full topic
item.source: Help with bug - get co owner

item.title: Help with bug - get co owner
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

yeah, dont offer staff places when they wont even be it since this is a forums to help others with server, but not spoon feeding.

grimreaper61:

dont offer co owner, no bribes. I suggest searching for a trade timer…fastest and easiest way to stop the duping. Just set a timer after trade is accepted where they cannot click decline.

yeah a trade timer will do it, there is lots of other ways to dupe also so watch out for those possible ways.

Read full topic
